title: Samsung ‘Spring Discover’ sale event has discounts on Galaxy S22 series, Watch4, and more
content:
The first official day of spring in the northern hemisphere was a few days ago, which naturally means it’s time for spring-themed sales. Samsung’s “Spring Discover” event officially kicked off this week, with some level of discount on nearly everything Samsung sells. That includes the brand new Galaxy S22 series, the Galaxy Watch4 lineup, tablets,

The post Samsung ‘Spring Discover’ sale event has discounts on Galaxy S22 series, Watch4, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started another sale event, with a mix of bundle deals, higher trade-in-values, and flat-out discounts on some devices.
